org.teamfarce.mirch

Class Suspect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.teamfarce.mirch.MapEntity
      • org.teamfarce.mirch.Suspect

  • public class Suspect
extends MapEntity
    Stores information about a single suspect character.

    • Method Detail

      • accuse

        boolean accuse(boolean hasEvidence)
        Accuse the suspect.

        This should take into account whether the player has sufficient evidence and whether the suspect is actually the murderer.

        Parameters:
        hasEvidence - Whether the player has sufficient evidence the accuse
        Returns:
        Whether the player has successfully accused the suspect
